attributes.action: Stop questions being printed back page of formal exams (GCSEs, A-Levels, ect).
attributes.additional_details: AQA chemistry triple (2019 GCSE) paper had a 6 mark question on the back that many people missed as there usually never any questions on the back page. 1 mark can be the difference between grades image how 6 marks can affect a grade.
attributes.background: Formal exams should ensure that there are never any questions printed on the back page. Many papers don’t have a question on the back and if there is one, it can be easily missed because few people check the back page. This can cause the difference between many grades.
